headline: Should Target’s (TGT) New Design and Merchandising Directors Reshape Its Post-CEO Transition Strategy?
summary: Target Corporation recently announced the past election of former NIKE chief innovation officer John Hoke III and former HanesBrands CEO and ex-Walmart chief merchandising officer Steve Bratspies to its Board of Directors, with Hoke joining on March 1 and Bratspies on April 1 to serve on key governance, compensation, audit, risk, infrastructure and finance committees. The timing of these high-profile board appointments, alongside Target’s pending CEO handover from Brian Cornell to Michael...

headline: 'Years Ago, People Laughed At McDonald's Workers.' Now A Jobseeker Says Landing A Job There Feels Like A Miracle
summary: One jobseeker recently posted on Reddit that they were turned down by multiple fast food chains, despite having years of experience. “10 years ago, people laughed at McDonald’s workers,” they wrote. “Now, even landing a job there is a miracle. headline: This millennial founder got rejected 73 times before building a 9-figure coffee company. One more no, ‘I would have figured out how to sell a kidney’
summary: Fellow CEO Jake Miller said a simple paycheck litmus test will help you decide if you’re on the right career path—a mindset shared by leaders like Warren Buffett.
